issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I am using arrowDB for one of my App. I have noticed that Appcelerator infrastructure uses AWS servers. Do we have any control over the region of the server selection by Appcelerator?

For example, if I would like to have my app data to be hosted only in the specific region, then would it be possible to request or configure?

If not what would be my option to achieve this.

Thanks.

comments.body: Yes, you can select a specific location using one of our VPC options, though they are more meant for the enterprise market. Support can connect you with sales for more information.
